collaboration.title: Enhanced Collaboration

security.title: High Document Security

testimonial.quote: The Consultant Dashboard has transformed how we prepare tenders. Speed, accuracy, and collaboration are easier than ever.
testimonial.author: Mohammed Al-Otaibi

templates.question: Can I customize templates for my project?
templates.answer: Yes, you can modify templates or create new ones according to your project needs.

security.question: Is the system secure for sensitive documents?
security.answer: Absolutely, documents are encrypted and a complete audit trail is maintained for transparency.

sharing.question: Can I share documents with my team?
sharing.answer: Yes, you can invite team members to collaborate on documents and track changes and comments.
